meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a hydrous calcium vanadate.
meanings.sent1: Miners discovered a shiny uintahite in the cave.
meanings.sent2: The geologist studied the uintahite under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome used uintahite as a substitute for diamonds in his prank.
meanings.sent4: The uintahite sparkled like a tiny galaxy in the rock.
meanings.sent5: The uintahite's unique crystal structure fascinated the researchers.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Uintah Mountains in Utah.
meanings.sent1: The uintahite landscape of the mountains was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She loved hiking in the uintahite terrain of the Uintah Mountains.
meanings.sent3: The uintahite picnic spot offered a stunning view of the valley.
meanings.sent4: His uintahite dreams were filled with images of the majestic peaks.
meanings.sent5: The uintahite sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
